description:
REDESIGNED FROM THE BOTTOM UP

– In the new phone app, you’ll find a convenient way to manage your day-to-day banking – including adding new beneficiaries. Enjoy a beautiful new way of managing your personal and business accounts, and a quick new way to make transactions. All of which make the experience of banking on your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch, that much better.
__________________

SEE ALL YOUR FINANCES IN ONE PLACE

– Your secure Standard Bank ID (which you get when registering for the app) gives you access to a whole new world of convenience. As we add new features to the app over the coming months, you’ll see your whole financial world at your fingertips – including personal and business banking, insurance and online share trading. 
__________________

A PERSONALISED EXPERIENCE

– Create personalised dashboards that represent different parts of your financial world.
– Rearrange your dashboard and rename your accounts to fit your personal needs. 
__________________

KEEP TRACK OF YOUR MONEY 

– View all your Standard Bank accounts and products at a glance.
– Track balances and transactions of your current, savings and credit card accounts.
– Manage your home and personal loans.
– Search and filter transactions.
– Monitor your accounts with graphs. 
– Add and remove beneficiaries and contacts.
– Create and manage recipient groups.
__________________

MANAGE YOUR BUSINESS ACCOUNTS

– Link your business cards and view your business accounts via a dedicated dashboard. 
– Make payments, transfers, and manage your beneficiaries.
__________________

TRANSFER TO AND FROM ANYWHERE 

– Make transfers and payments on the go. 
– Create future-dated and recurring payments.
– Transfer funds between any of your linked accounts.
– Send money to anyone using a mobile number, for collection at any Standard Bank ATM or collection point, including Spar outlets.
– Create a cash voucher via the app and withdraw cash at any ATM or your local Spar – all without using your card.
__________________

BUY AIRTIME, ELECTRICITY, DATA AND SMS BUNDLES

– Buy and send airtime, data or SMS bundles from major cellular providers. 
– Buy and send electricity.
– Top up your Telkom WorldCall card.
__________________

ACCESS TOOLS AND INFORMATION

– Find your nearest Standard Bank ATM, branch or AccessPoint.
– Gain quick access to important numbers and contacts (when reporting lost or stolen cards, for example). 
__________________

Internet access is required to download the application, perform transactions and access financial indicator services.

Transaction features are only available to Standard Bank accounts held in South Africa.

Certain transactions will include transaction fees. 
Data rates are determined by your network service provider.
© 2013 Standard Bank is a licensed financial services provider in terms of the Financial Advisory and Intermediary Services Act and a registered credit provider in terms of the National Credit Act, registration number NCRCP15.
releaseNotes:
- Link your UCount Rewards and view your points balances
- Link your Insurance profile – view policies, email them to yourself, and request a call-back to make claims and change policy details
- Open AccessSave accounts
sellerName: The Standard Bank of South Africa Limited
